title: Game on! Ugreen debuts colorful Genshin Impact charger collection.
description: Four new Ugreen "Genshin Impact" charging products combine practical device charging with design aesthetics from the popular adventure game. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: David Snow
excerpt: Four new Ugreen "Genshin Impact" charging products combine practical device charging with design aesthetics from the popular adventure game.
text: News "Genshin Impact" players or anyone who wants less-boring chargers might enjoy this collection. Photo: David Snow/Cult of Mac Apple users who enjoy the popular open-world adventure game Genshin Impact now have a stylish way to keep their devices powered up, Ugreen said Monday. Known for its charging accessories, the company said it partnered with game creators to launch a co-branded collection of four Ugreen Genshen Impact charging products. The company sent them to me. It looks like a fun collection. Ugreen Genshin Impact charging products Ugreen’s new “Power Up, Game On” themed collection features four chargers that take on distinctive aesthetics inspired by Kinich, the Dendro-wielding Saurian Hunter character from Genshin Impact‘s newest nation, Natlan. Interestingly, Ugreen isn’t alone in this. Seagate offers new Genshin Impact-themed products, too, among others. Thoughtful design integration sets this Ugreen Genshin Impact charging products collection apart. Intricate patterns inspired by Kinich align well with Ugreen’s signature green branding. “This collaboration brings together two brands that value both performance and aesthetics,” said a Ugreen representative. “Apple users have always appreciated products that combine function with thoughtful design, which is exactly what this collection delivers.” What’s in Ugreen’s collection? Sure, I’d be more into it if I played “Genshin Impact” — or if I gamed at all — but it’s a fun twist on charging.Photo: David Snow/Cult of Mac The gift box Ugreen sent me is impressive. For iPhone 15 and MagSafe users, the standout product is the Ugreen MagFlow Wireless Charger Genshin Impact Edition ($59.99). It features Qi2 certification for 15W fast wireless charging — the maximum wireless charging speed currently available for iPhones. This foldable 2-in-1 charger includes a magnetic pad compatible with all MagSafe iPhones, an earbuds dock perfect for AirPods and even an extra USB-C port for charging an Apple Watch. That makes it an ideal all-in-one solution for Apple’s ecosystem. Foldable MacBook users will appreciate the Ugreen Nexode Charger Genshin Impact Edition ($39.99), a compact 65W GaN fast charger capable of quickly powering up MacBook Air models and maintaining charge on MacBook Pros while in use. With two USB-C ports and one USB-A port, it can simultaneously charge a MacBook, iPhone, and AirPods — a perfect companion for Apple users on the go. 65W of portable power Ugreen Nexode USB-C Charger (65W) This Genshin Impact Edition Nexode 3-port GaN fast USB-C charger is a compact power adapter with foldable prongs for MacBook Pro/Air, iPhone 16/15, iPad Pro and more. The collection also includes a hefty Ugreen Nexode Power Bank Genshin Impact Edition ($89.99), featuring a substantial 20,000mAh capacity with 100W fast charging capabilities. That’s enough to fully charge a MacBook Air or multiple iPhones before needing a recharge. The power bank includes a TFT display showing real-time power data. It features a unique pixel art animation of K’uhul Ajaw (Kinich’s dragon companion) when powered on. Smart TFT display Ugreen Nexode Power Bank This Genshin Impact-themed 20,000mAh, 130W portable charger features 72Wh PD fast charging, three ports and a TFT smart display. Rounding out the collection is the Ugreen USB-C to USB-C Cable Genshin Impact Edition ($9.99). It’s a durable nylon-braided cable supporting up to 100W charging. That’s great for the latest Apple devices that have transitioned to USB-C, including iPhone 15 models, iPad Pro, iPad Air and MacBooks. 100W PD Design meets function The power bank features a 20,000mAh battery and a display.Photo: Ugreen Ugreen Genshin Impact charging product: Limited-time offers and availability The collection goes on sale starting Monday at 6 p.m. PT on Ugreen’s official website, its Amazon.com store, and the TikTok Shop, the company said. Apple users who love Genshin Impact should act quickly. Ugreen runs a limited-time promotion with chances to win an exclusive Ugreen × Genshin Impact Kinich Collectible Gift Box and other merchandise through its website and social media channels. Buy from Amazon: Ugreen Nexode Power Bank Genshin Impact Edition ($89.99)  Ugreen Nexode Charger Genshin Impact Edition ($39.99) Ugreen MagFlow Wireless Charger Genshin Impact Edition ($59.99) Ugreen USB-C to USB-C Cable Genshin Impact Edition ($9.99)
html:
• News

Apple users who enjoy the popular open-world adventure game Genshin Impact now have a stylish way to keep their devices powered up, Ugreen said Monday. Known for its charging accessories, the company said it partnered with game creators to launch a co-branded collection of four Ugreen Genshen Impact charging products. The company sent them to me. It looks like a fun collection.

Ugreen Genshin Impact charging products

Ugreen’s new “Power Up, Game On” themed collection features four chargers that take on distinctive aesthetics inspired by Kinich, the Dendro-wielding Saurian Hunter character from Genshin Impact‘s newest nation, Natlan. Interestingly, Ugreen isn’t alone in this. Seagate offers new Genshin Impact-themed products, too, among others.

Thoughtful design integration sets this Ugreen Genshin Impact charging products collection apart. Intricate patterns inspired by Kinich align well with Ugreen’s signature green branding.

“This collaboration brings together two brands that value both performance and aesthetics,” said a Ugreen representative. “Apple users have always appreciated products that combine function with thoughtful design, which is exactly what this collection delivers.”

What’s in Ugreen’s collection?

The gift box Ugreen sent me is impressive. For iPhone 15 and MagSafe users, the standout product is the Ugreen MagFlow Wireless Charger Genshin Impact Edition ($59.99). It features Qi2 certification for 15W fast wireless charging — the maximum wireless charging speed currently available for iPhones. This foldable 2-in-1 charger includes a magnetic pad compatible with all MagSafe iPhones, an earbuds dock perfect for AirPods and even an extra USB-C port for charging an Apple Watch. That makes it an ideal all-in-one solution for Apple’s ecosystem.

Foldable

MacBook users will appreciate the Ugreen Nexode Charger Genshin Impact Edition ($39.99), a compact 65W GaN fast charger capable of quickly powering up MacBook Air models and maintaining charge on MacBook Pros while in use. With two USB-C ports and one USB-A port, it can simultaneously charge a MacBook, iPhone, and AirPods — a perfect companion for Apple users on the go.

65W of portable power

Ugreen Nexode USB-C Charger (65W)

This Genshin Impact Edition Nexode 3-port GaN fast USB-C charger is a compact power adapter with foldable prongs for MacBook Pro/Air, iPhone 16/15, iPad Pro and more.

The collection also includes a hefty Ugreen Nexode Power Bank Genshin Impact Edition ($89.99), featuring a substantial 20,000mAh capacity with 100W fast charging capabilities. That’s enough to fully charge a MacBook Air or multiple iPhones before needing a recharge. The power bank includes a TFT display showing real-time power data. It features a unique pixel art animation of K’uhul Ajaw (Kinich’s dragon companion) when powered on.

Smart TFT display

Ugreen Nexode Power Bank

This Genshin Impact-themed 20,000mAh, 130W portable charger features 72Wh PD fast charging, three ports and a TFT smart display.

Rounding out the collection is the Ugreen USB-C to USB-C Cable Genshin Impact Edition ($9.99). It’s a durable nylon-braided cable supporting up to 100W charging. That’s great for the latest Apple devices that have transitioned to USB-C, including iPhone 15 models, iPad Pro, iPad Air and MacBooks.

100W PD

Design meets function

Ugreen Genshin Impact charging product: Limited-time offers and availability

The collection goes on sale starting Monday at 6 p.m. PT on Ugreen’s official website, its Amazon.com store, and the TikTok Shop, the company said. Apple users who love Genshin Impact should act quickly. Ugreen runs a limited-time promotion with chances to win an exclusive Ugreen × Genshin Impact Kinich Collectible Gift Box and other merchandise through its website and social media channels.

Buy from Amazon:

  • Ugreen Nexode Power Bank Genshin Impact Edition ($89.99) 
  • Ugreen Nexode Charger Genshin Impact Edition ($39.99)
  • Ugreen MagFlow Wireless Charger Genshin Impact Edition ($59.99)
  • Ugreen USB-C to USB-C Cable Genshin Impact Edition ($9.99)
